  • Field Details

    • rowsAffected

      public static int rowsAffected

  • Constructor Details

    • Driver

      public Driver(String name, String city, String workload)
      The constructor for the Driver class. It is not used, but has been included for the sake of completeness.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the driver.
      city - The city that s/he covers.
      workload - The number of deliveries s/he to make.

  • Method Details

    • createDriver

      public static void createDriver(Connection connection, Scanner input) throws SQLException
      The method to create a new record of a driver in the driver table. It is used as a utility method in the captureNewDriver method in the main class of the program where it is invoked by the main method.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement
      input - The Scanner instance from the main method needed here to read input from the user with the help of the utility class, UserInput
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findDriverName

      public static String findDriverName(Connection connection, int driverId) throws SQLException
      This method finds a driver name from the input of a driver id. It is used in displayOrder and printInvoice methods in the Order class as well as the ordersAllocatedToDriver method in the main class of the program.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for PreparedStatement
      driverId - The unique internal identification number for the driver.
      Returns:
      The name of the driver corresponding to the entered driver unique id.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findDriverId

      public static int findDriverId(Connection connection, Scanner input) throws SQLException
      A method to find the driver unique id from the driver's full name. It is used in the ordersAllocatedToDriver method in the main class of the program.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      input - The Scanner instance from the main method needed to read input with the help of the utility class UserInput.
      Returns:
      The driver id corresponding to the full name that was entered.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • driverAllocation

      public static int driverAllocation(Connection connection, String city) throws SQLException
      A method that allocates a driver id to an order based on the restaurant city and the driver's workload. It is used in the addInitialOrderDetails method in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      city - The restaurant location (city) needed for the decision-making process.
      Returns:
      The unique driver if that should be allocated to the delivery.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • updateDriverWorkload

      public static void updateDriverWorkload(Connection connection, String typeOfUpdate, int driverId) throws SQLException
      When a driver is allocated a new order or when an order is finalised it is necessary to adjust the workload of that particular driver. This method contains that functionality. It is used in the addInitialOrderDetails and makeFinal methods in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for PreparedStatement.
      typeOfUpdate - This determines whether the update is to remove or add an order to the driver's driver_workload field in the driver table.
      driverId - The unique id number for the driver that needs to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findOrdersAllocatedToDriver

      public static ArrayList<Integer> findOrdersAllocatedToDriver(Connection connection, int driverId) throws SQLException
      This method covers the functionality of finding all orders that is allocated to a specific user. It is invoked in the ordersAllocatedToDriver method in the main class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      driverId - The unique driver if of the driver of interest.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with the order numbers of all orders allocated to the driver identified by the driverId.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • performFieldUpdate

      public static void performFieldUpdate(Connection connection, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue, int driverId) throws SQLException
      A generic method to handle updates of any fields in the driver table except for the driver_id field which is unique.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      fieldToUpdate - The specific field name of the field that should be updated.
      newValue - The new value of the field.
      driverId - The unique id number of the driver that needs to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.
